title: Players will always optimize the fun out of video games
body:
Nobody but me buys sotd

Nobody but me buys the stat stick

Everybody has to tryhard

Everybody has to stack tank stats

Why

It's a 4fun mode

---

The title also applies to "runes reforged." "Freedom of choice" is only an illusion in a competitive game. There will _always_ be a best choice. Nobody's going to be playing fastest nasus or world tour TF. They're going to be playing what's _best._ 

Revert to 2017 masteries
